mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM dj_pay_business_order where member_id = #{memberId} ORDER BY create_date desc

SELECT a.id AS id, a.number AS orderId, CONCAT( c.residential, c.building, '栋', c.unit, '单元', c.number, '号' ) AS houseName, a.member_id AS memberId, d.mobile AS mobile, a.pay_order_number AS payOrderNumber, a.total_price AS totalAmount, a.discounts_price AS redPackAmount, a.pay_price AS actualPayment, b.create_date AS createDate, a.type AS type, a.state AS state, a.task_id AS taskId, b.pay_state AS payType FROM dj_pay_business_order AS a LEFT JOIN dj_pay_pay_order AS b ON b.number = a.pay_order_number INNER JOIN dj_house AS c ON a.house_id = c.id INNER JOIN dj_member AS d ON d.id = a.member_id WHERE a.data_status = 0
and a.state = #{state}
and ( d.mobile like CONCAT('%',#{searchKey},'%') or CONCAT( c.residential, c.building, '栋', c.unit, '单元', c.number, '号' ) LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKey},'%') or a.pay_order_number like CONCAT('%',#{searchKey},'%') or a.number like CONCAT('%',#{searchKey},'%'))
ORDER BY b.create_date DESC

SELECT it.product_sn AS productSn, it.product_name AS productName, it.image AS image, it.price AS price, it.shop_count AS shopCount, it.total_price AS totalPrice, it.worker_goods_sn AS goodsSn, it.worker_goods_name AS goodsName, IFNULL( it.product_type, 2 ) AS type FROM dj_pay_business_order AS p INNER JOIN dj_deliver_order AS o ON p.number = o.business_order_number INNER JOIN dj_deliver_order_item AS it ON o.id = it.order_id WHERE p.number = #{number} ORDER BY it.product_type
